Methods in translator.minionModel with parameters of type MinionBoundsVariable
 void MinionModel.addBoundsVariable(MinionBoundsVariable boundsVariable)
          Computes the relative index of the variable and puts it into the list of Bound variables.
 void MinionModel.addBoundsVariableCube(MinionBoundsVariable[][][] cube, int matrixOffset, int vectorOffset, int elemOffset)
          Add a cube of bounds variables to Minion Model.
 void MinionModel.addBoundsVariableMatrix(MinionBoundsVariable[][] matrix, int vectorOffset, int elementOffset)
          Add a matrix of new minion bounds variables
 void MinionModel.addBoundsVariableVector(MinionBoundsVariable[] variableVector, int offset)
          Creates a vector (size is specified by the parameter) of new Minion bound variables and computes its relative index in the model (each variable has a relative index (index concerning bound variables only) and an absolute index (index concerning all variables) and can only be identified by that).
